mapper.insert: INSERT INTO employee (name, username, password, phone, sex, id_number, create_time, update_time, create_user, update_user, status) VALUES (#{name}, #{username}, #{password}, #{phone}, #{sex}, #{idNumber}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime}, #{createUser}, #{updateUser}, #{status})
mapper.select:
select id, name, username, phone, update_time, status from employee
and name like concat('%',#{name},'%')
